name: A day in the life of a cynic
name_original: A day in the life of a cynic
description:
Description:

This is the second work of the Musain Games team, and it's a short and intense story-driven game about the happenings of 1832...

You are Rene Grantaire a realist that is about 30 years old, and when you woke up from your slumber all the wine from the Musain had gone missing...

How to play:

Your aim is to collect all the wine bottles and get drunk enough to go upstairs and go confront the leader in red

Controls:

 move with WASD/arrow keys

interact with 'E'

Leave a review or comment if you liked the game and if you found any bugs or issues comment on them, I'll be fixing them soon.
